mapper.select: select id, keyword, updateTime from ${siteId}_relate_keyword limit 1

select a.id, a.keyword, concat(group_concat(b.value)) value, a.updateTime from ${siteId}_relate_keyword a left join ${siteId}_relate_keyword_value b on b.keyId = a.id where keyword = #{keyword} group by a.id
select a.id, a.keyword, concat(group_concat(b.value)) value, a.updateTime from ${siteId}_relate_keyword a left join ${siteId}_relate_keyword_value b on b.keyId = a.id group by a.id
select a.id, a.keyword, concat(group_concat(b.value)) value, a.updateTime from ${siteId}_relate_keyword a left join ${siteId}_relate_keyword_value b on b.keyId = a.id where a.id=#{id} group by a.id
mapper.insert: insert into ${siteId}_relate_keyword (keyword,updateTime) select * from (select #{entry.keyword},#{entry.updateTime} ) a where (select count(*) from ${siteId}_relate_keyword where keyword=#{entry.keyword} ) = 0
